channel.title: R.u.s.e
channel.description:
A game soon coming out for PC, Xbox360, and PS3.
Definition of RUSE - a deceptive maneuver (especially to avoid capture); an artifice; trick; stratagem; wile; fraud; deceit
R.U.S.E is basically a war strategic game, but better than those other ones you see in my opinion. It will be released 2/2/10.
In a nutshell this game takes place in WW2 as you play as the Germans, Russians, Americans and I think the U.K, in some of the largest, most epic battles of WW2. You trick, (or RUSE) your enemy, send bombers, naval support and ground units. You can judge where attacks are going and have a surprise attack.
Enough chit chat from me though. Here are some videos and links for you too see, tell me what you think. I'll be getting this game for sure. If you are to for Xbox tell me so I can add you and play against you. (Yes, it's multiplayer.)
Visit
Rusegame.com for the main website.
And here for a lot of videos and more ratings and info.
http://www.gametrailers.com/game/r-u-s-e/11033
Pics: [img]http://static2.cdn.ubi.com/ncsa/ruse/screens/full/RUSE_ALL_Screenshot_Airfight_02.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static2.cdn.ubi.com/ncsa/ruse/screens/full/RUSE_ALL_Screenshot_Ambush_10.jpg[/img] [img]http://static2.cdn.ubi.com/ncsa/ruse/screens/full/RUSE_ALL_Screenshot_Paratroopers_01.jpg[/img] [img]http://static2.cdn.ubi.com/ncsa/ruse/screens/full/RUSE_ALL_Screenshot_Radio_Silence_Effect.jpg[/img]
See ya guys.

i raff u ruse

I am starting to get sick of games based WW2: so unoriginal. Needs moar vietnam war fps’s
